82  void insert(FT v) {
83  try {
84  p.push_back(v);
85  } catch (const std::bad_alloc&) {
86  std::cerr << "Out of memory when reading data, exiting..." << std::endl;
87  exit(1);

149  void printPoints() {
150  int c = 0;
151  for (size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); ++i) {
152  std::cout << p[i] << " ";
153  if (c++ == D - 1) {
154  std::cout << "\n";
155  c = 0;
156  }
157  }
158  }
159 
163  void computeSquare() {
164  int c = 0;
165  FT sq = 0;
166  squared_coords.resize(N);
167  for (size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); ++i) {
168  sq += p[i];
169  if (c++ == D - 1) {
170  squared_coords.push_back(sq);
171  sq = 0;
172  c = 0;
173  }
174  }
175  }
176

181  size_t N;
185  int D;
190  std::vector<FT> p;
196  std::vector<FT> squared_coords;

212 template<typename T>
213 T squared_Eucl_distance(std::vector<T> &p1,
214  std::vector<T> &p2) {
215  typename std::vector<T>::iterator it2 = p2.begin();
216  float squared_distance = 0.;
217  float diff;
218  for (typename std::vector<T>::iterator it1 = p1.begin(); it1 < p1.end();
219  ++it1, ++it2) {
220  diff = *it1 - *it2;
221  squared_distance += diff * diff;
222  }
223  return squared_distance;
224 }

241 template<typename T>
242 T squared_Eucl_distance(const std::vector<T> &p1, size_t start,
243  size_t end, const std::vector<T> &p2) {
244  // this one
245  typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator it2 = p2.begin();
246  T squared_distance = 0;
247  T diff;
248  for (size_t i = start; i < end; ++i, ++it2) {
249  diff = p1[i] - *it2;
250  squared_distance += diff * diff;
251  }
252  return squared_distance;
253 }
254 
269 template<typename T>
270 T squared_Eucl_distanceU(const std::vector<T> &p1, size_t start,
271  size_t end, const std::vector<T> &p2) {
272 /* meant to be used only for 128 dimensions, but it is still slower.
273 First method: 2.49e-07 seconds.
274 Second method: 7.88e-07 seconds.
275 
276 First method: 2.51e-07 seconds.
277 Second method: 7.89e-07 seconds.
278 
279 First method: 2.55e-07 seconds.
280 Second method: 6.65e-07 seconds.
281 */
282 
283  typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator it2 = p2.begin();
284  T squared_distance = 0;
285  T diff0, diff1, diff2, diff3;
286  for (size_t i = start; i < end; ++i, ++it2) {
287  diff0 = p1[i++] - *it2++;
288  diff1 = p1[i++] - *it2++;
289  diff2 = p1[i++] - *it2++;
290  diff3 = p1[i] - *it2;
291 
292  squared_distance += (diff0 * diff0) + (diff1 * diff1) + (diff2 * diff2) + (diff3 * diff3);
293  }
294  return squared_distance;
295 }
296 
311 template<typename T>
312 T squared_Eucl_distance(const std::vector<T> &p1, size_t start, size_t end,
313  T p1_sq, const std::vector<T> &p2, T p2_sq) {
314 /*
315 Slower than the usual method:
316 First method: 1.52e-07 seconds.
317 Second method: 4.89e-07 seconds.
318 
319 First method: 1.54e-07 seconds.
320 Second method: 5.03e-07 seconds.
321 */
322  typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator it2 = p2.begin();
323  T dot_product = 0;
324  for (size_t i = start; i < end; ++i, ++it2) {
325  dot_product += p1[i] * *it2;
326  }
327  return p1_sq + p2_sq - 2 * dot_product;
328 }
329 
347 template<typename T>
348 T squared_Eucl_distance(const std::vector<T> &p, size_t start1,
349  size_t end1, size_t start2) {
350  typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator it2 = p.begin() + start2;
351  float squared_distance = 0.;
352  float diff;
353  for (size_t i = start1; i < end1; ++i, ++it2) {
354  diff = p[i] - *it2;
355  squared_distance += diff * diff;
356  }
357  return squared_distance;
358 }

379  std::vector<size_t>::iterator& start1,

381  std::vector<size_t>::iterator start2) {
382  float squared_distance = 0.;
383  float diff;
384  for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator it = start1; it < end1; ++it, ++start2) {

409 template<typename T>
410 T squared_Eucl_distance(const std::vector<T> &p,
411  std::vector<size_t>::iterator& start1,
412  std::vector<size_t>::iterator end1,
413  size_t index2) {
414  float squared_distance = 0.;
415  float diff;
416  for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator it = start1; it < end1; ++it, ++index2) {
417  diff = *it - p[index2];
418  squared_distance += diff * diff;
419  }
420  return squared_distance;
421 }

430 template<typename T>
431 T Eucl_distance(const std::vector<T> &p1, size_t start,
432  size_t end, const std::vector<T> &p2) {
433  return std::sqrt(squared_Eucl_distance(p1, start, end, p2));
434 }
435 
443 template<typename T>
444 void computeSquare(const std::vector<T>& p, const size_t N, const size_t D,
445  std::vector<T>& squared_coords) {
446  int c = 0;
447  T sq = 0;
448  for (size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); ++i) {
449  sq += p[i] * p[i];
450  if (c++ == D - 1) {
451  squared_coords.push_back(sq);
452  sq = 0;
453  c = 0;
454  }
455  }
456 }
457 
467 template<typename T>
468 void computeSquare(const std::vector< std::vector<T> >& p, const size_t N, const size_t D,
469  std::vector<T>& squared_coords) {
470  T sq = 0;
471  for (size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); ++i) {
472  for (size_t j = 0; j < D; ++j) {
473  sq += p[i][j] * p[i][j];
474  }
475  squared_coords.push_back(sq);
476  sq = 0;
477  }
478 }
